properties.areaDesc: S of Currituck Beach Light NC to Oregon Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 22 at 2:31AM EST until January 26 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 6 to 9 ft.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Duck to Oregon Inlet.

* WHEN...Until 2 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
